Intelligent Skimming on Semantic Scholar

The Semantic Reader and intelligent skimming feature are only available on a desktop browser.

Feeling overwhelmed by EMNLP 2022 proceedings? Would you like a faster way to skim papers? The Semantic Scholar team at AI2 is testing a new intelligent skimming system to surface the most important parts of a manuscript.

To test this system, open the PDF of any of the papers on the right, and click on the skim icon as shown above.
